name: psr1lmod

stmt.origin: opsrlmod(c1, c1o, c0, emptycls, con0, wcel(c0, crg))
stmt.pretty: opsrlmod(c1, c1o, c0, emptycls, con0, c0 ∈ Ring)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, clmod))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(co(c1o, copws, c0), emptycls))
-| wi(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1o, con0))
-| wi(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c0, crg))
-| wi(wcel(c0, crg), wss(emptycls, cxp(c1o, c1o)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Ring → c1 ∈ LMod)
⊣ c1 =((1o[ordPwSer]c0)` ∅)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Ring → 1o ∈ On)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Ring → c0 ∈ Ring)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Ring → ∅ ⊆(1o × 1o))
